title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.3 - Application for order of immediate possession
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1801.3 - Application for order of immediate possession

State Regulations

An application for an order of immediate possession, made
to a court in a condemnation proceeding, may include a request that the order
provide for immediate vesting of title to the property, upon the filing of the
order of immediate possession. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1801.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
